All the staff were always happy, kind and able to lend a helping hand and such hard workers and so lovely. Thankyou for making our stay a memorable one.

commentaire: Ideal location.  Missed the breakfast
type_logement_utilisateur: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

commentaire:
I had a very very bad experience today. After checking out, I bought a meal with the intention of eating it on the first floor of the hotel before taking a taxi to the airport. I asked an elderly staff at the entrance if I could eat my meal in the breakfast area, and I was given permission. However, another younger staff at the entrance then told me that I could not eat there and insisted that I finish my meal on the seat near the entrance. Eating at the entrance seemed very inappropriate, and there were tables with chairs opposite the check-in station in the lobby, where I wanted to sit, but I was refused. The young staff insisted that I sit on the seats near the entrance, claiming it was still indoors, and his attitude was very rude.

I can understand and accept the request not to dine in the restaurant area, perhaps due to their concern about additional cleaning. I can also accept being told that guests who have checked out are not allowed to eat in the lobby, as I was no longer their guest. However, I cannot accept the rude attitude of the young male staff at the entrance. Even though I had checked out, I should not be treated like an animal, forced to eat at the entrance. This is highly insulting behavior, and I don't understand his motive for doing so. During my stay, I saw other guests eating light meals on the seats opposite the check-in situation several times.

I believe his actions towards me were racially and gender biased. Throughout my stay, the service station staff, cleaning staff, and other hotel employees were all very friendly. Only this young man today was exceptionally rude and intolerable. If my request was not allowed, it could have been directly refused without degrading behavior. Guests who have checked out should still have their rights and should be treated with respect.
type_logement_utilisateur: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

titre_commentaire: Great location, good value for money
commentaire: Great location close to amazing local street food, excellent craft coffee cafes as well as a great craft local beer spot just 100m up the road. The BTS is attached to the property too! 1km walk to paragon mall and siam square. Breakfast was 300baht per head and had everything you need , surprisingly well cooked scrambled eggs, croissants , yoghurt , cakes and breads, Thai options , dim sum and siu mai fruit and more ! The hotel itself is an old banger, but clean and has everything you need!
